issue.title: [C++] Add hash-join support for large-offset types (e.g. large_string) and dictionary encoded types to the new hash-join impl
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16224](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16224). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current proposal for the improved hash-join does not support using large binary types (those with 8 byte offsets) or dictionary types as key columns.  We should support those.
